short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Real-time monitoring of websites and servers with a minimalist interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NodeTrack is a streamlined, intuitive Chrome extension that offers real-time monitoring of websites and servers. With a minimalist interface and effective alert system, NodeTrack ensures users are immediately informed of any issues, all while maintaining a sleek, modern design that's easy on the eyes.
